ValidationRule.description: If Error Type field is populated Error Description cannot be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: No_Errors_Found__c == FALSE && Flow_Validation_Rule_Bypass_Check__c = FALSE && AND( ISBLANK( Error_Description__c ) , NOT( ISBLANK( Error_Type__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have filled out the Error Type, please also provide the Error Description before saving the record.
